Questions.Question: When should you begin using the training covered in this course?
Options: Immediately after this training is completed
When you have been trained and requested to implement PPIF that generate Quality Records

Questions.Question: The only way to correct an electronic Quality Record is to:
Options: Document the appropriate information about the correction
Log, sign and date the log entry, and make the correction in the electronic system

Questions.Question: Quality Records may be filed in the following locations:
Options: At individual desks only with Records Management personnel

Questions.Question: Quality Records are:
Questions.Answer: The historical records that demonstrate the execution of activities typically described by Quality System

Questions.Question: When correcting a Quality Record, you may erase the incorrect information and write the corrected information on the record.
If no information is required in a particular space on a Quality System form, you may leave it blank.
When creating a Quality Record, you must comply with:
Questions.Answer: The training described in this course, instructions, procedures, and training requirements associated with the record
